e Remote Engine Shutdown

Remotely Engine Shutdown

This Add-In demonstrates the capabilities of the IOX-OUTPUT.

Select a vehicle and IOX state and then hit "Apply" to send a message to the device, turning the Engein Shutdown Relay on or off.
